page.title: 06Local Whitby News.
page.content: 28/6/85. The{Endeavour Project}was headline news today.Plans to build a full size replica of{Captain Cook's}ship, the {Endeavour,}at Whitby, at a cost of about Â£3m. was discussed at EEC Headquarters in Brussels. The project could attract more tourists to the town and create jobs. Â£13,500 has already been provided towards a technical study for building the ship. {Drugs Concern:}The department of health and social security has said that a nationwide survey conducted through regional health authorities has shown that there is no significant drug problem in the{Scarborough Health {District}which includes Whitby. The{Manpower Services Commission}has launched its fourth and largest{jobs } scheme at Botton Village. Whitby people have filled many vacancies.
